name: Grow Together [Demo Game]
description:
Disclaimer

This project is my personal Strategy game project in game design class in major of Special Topics in Games and Interactive Media 1 (GI491) from Bangkok university Thailand.

Intro

If you’re looking for a game that helps improve your English and time management for your child, we would like to present Grow Together. This game will help children enjoy English, and time management. This game also has cute graphics that make the player enjoy the game. " Let’s enhance development together with Grow Together! "

The player will be playing as " Jenny ", a happy girl who lives in Happy Town. She's a good kid who helps her mother do housework, sometimes she receives money as a reward for helping her.

Feature

The game will have a big map. There are 4 locations which are...

" Home "
  • Accepting quest from mother system :
    • Player can walk to Jenny's mother to accept quests, but player can accept only 3 quests per day from 4 quests.
    • Each day, quests are assigned randomly, including rewards in each quest too.
  • Doing quest system :
    • Player can revisit previous quests include Rewards that player received from Quest Board.
  • Sleeping system :
    • Player can go to bed in time by pressing Spacebar at bed before time runs out (One day in game = 4 minutes) to start next day with Happiness = 6 everyday.
    • If the player doesn't go to bed before time runs out, Happiness will be reduced by 2, and it will be reduced continuously if player still doesn't sleep in time. (Note: The lowest value Happiness can be reduced to is 2.)
    • When player do a quest and Happiness reach 0, it means that player can't do any quest anymore.
  • Event system :
    • Player can press Spacebar at the calendar in the bedroom to check the event of that day.
  • Achievements system : 
    • Player can check Achievement details at Achievements bookshelf in the living room.
  • Inside the house, player can check clothes at Collections closet.
" Market "
  • Player can enter the market only when doing 'Shopping at the market' quest assigned by Jenny's mother.
" Bakery "
  • Player can buy sweets to increase Happiness value. (Note: Maximum Happiness is 12.)
  • Happiness affects the odds of winning rare items in the wheel of fortune at Magic shop.
" Magic Shop "
  • Player can look at the board to check how much Happiness will affect the chance to get items. (Note: It also depends on player's personal luck at that time.)
  • If player spins the wheel and gets the same clothes, Magic shop will return the fund back to the player.
Control WASD / Arrow WalkSpacebarInteractions

*** Please don't press 'Spacebar' and 'WASD / Arrow' keys at the same time. ***
